channel.title: Monster drops all Item2. Drops in 1 kill! help!?!?!

item.title: Monster drops all Item2. Drops in 1 kill! help!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

Im working on a new project… with Project Evolved as base source! (scratch almost!)

but i got a problem! its dropping all the items in item2.java in 1 kill, but i dont think i did anything wrong! can someone help me out!?

item2.

public static int mans[] = {1725,1118,1118,1173,1189,1205,1237,1307,1725,1321 ,1376,1422,1422};

public static int randommans()
{
return mans[(int)(Math.random()*mans.length)];
}

npchandler

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1) //mans { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randommans(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

it does drop, so that aint the problem. but it drops all the drops at once,

here is a error :S from runserver as soon as i killed a monster, and i go with my mouse over the drops, it tells me this in runserver…

Unhandled packet [40, InterFaceId: 6347, size=2]: ]4B 30[ Action Button: 24075

anyone has a clue to … fix the drops? i need a fix to let it drop 1 drop at the time!

Read full topic
item.source: Monster drops all Item2. Drops in 1 kill! help!?!?!
